_header: After that Saint Denis was thus I-brought adawe
Subjects: Nycasie, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St Nycasie in one MS of the South English Legendary — in couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
After þat seint denys was þus I brouȝt of daweȝ
                    nycasie was bysschop þo of cristen men lawe…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& ȝeue vs space an erþe oure synnes to beten
                    hereþat we mowe in heuene blis euere to wonie þere
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 326-8.
